node.title: Police issue 200 fines after gathering of illegal street racers
node.description: Two hundred infringement notices were issued by police following a crackdown on a gathering of illegal street racers in Waikato District last week.

node.title: Aucklanders let down by America's Cup move - Mayor
node.description: Auckland Mayor Phil Goff says the city's residents will be disappointed with the decision to move the America's Cup to Spain, but Team New Zealand's boss is defending the move. Audio

node.title: U.S. nonprofit delivers gear to Ukrainian civilians fighting Russia
node.description: "You'll probably not find anybody else where an aircraft leaves the United States and the warriors have that equipment on their body in that same day," said Spirit of America's chief of international operations.

node.title: High school athlete raises money for best friend who was paralyzed
node.description: The teens, who have been friends since sixth grade, have shown the meaning of true friendship.

node.title: U.S. preparing for potential spike in arrivals at southern border
node.description: The Biden administration is building migrant holding facilities, soliciting contracts for transportation services and deploying additional immigration agents.

node.title: Person pleads not guilty to criminal charge for alleged insider trading
node.description: A person has pleaded not guilty to a criminal charge for alleged insider trading.

node.title: Foo Fighters cancel tour dates after death of drummer Taylor Hawkins
node.description: The Foo Fighters have cancelled all their upcoming tour dates following the death of drummer Taylor Hawkins.

node.title: 'Just fabulous' - Local mayor welcomes Transmission Gully opening
node.description: The new Transmission Gully motorway will open up the Wellington region, speed up travel times and bring in more business, a local mayor says. Audio

node.title: 5 killed in mass shooting in Israel
node.description: The shooter was killed by police.

node.title: How the police watchdog is more secretive than the spy agency
node.description: Why is the SIS subject to the Official Information Act while the IPCA is not? The chair of the police watchdog defends the secrecy but admits it doesn't have enough resources to do its job properly.

node.title: Body found in Pennsylvania creek identified as man missing since 2003
node.description: Amabile went missing after telling his childrens' babysitter he was running five minutes late in December 2003.

node.title: Bolton says he recalls Trump using the term "burner phones"
node.description: White House records show a gap of over 7 hours in Trump's communication on January 6, and the former president said he's never heard of the phrase "burner phones."

node.title: Christchurch Hospital coping as region's infections outstrip Auckland
node.description: Canterbury has almost three times the rate of new Covid-19 infections as Auckland, as the outbreak shifts south.

node.title: Biden signs bill making lynching a federal hate crime
node.description: Congress for decades failed to pass anti-lynching legislation through both chambers.

node.title: Teen who died at theme park may have been too heavy for ride
node.description: The ride's manufacturer says no one weighing more than 286 pounds should be allowed on. Tyre Sampson weighed over 300.

node.title: NASA astronaut heading home after record flight
node.description: Mark Vande Hei credits frequent chats with family, exercise and meditation for staying on an even keel.

node.title: Home prices have soared 19% in 20 major U.S. cities
node.description: Housing prices are climbing sharply in 20 cities, while places like Phoenix have seen costs soar 33% in a year.

node.title: NZ Super Fund explores offshore wind energy opportunity in partnership
node.description: It has partnered with Danish investment firm Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners to see if such a project would be in the South Taranaki Bight.

node.title: Luxon backs co-governance debate, shies from referendum
node.description: National's leader Christopher Luxon has said no to a referendum on co-governance - for now - something likely coalition partner ACT has said is a bottom-line.

node.title: Countdown begins for motorists to test much delayed Transmission Gully
node.description: The $1.25 billion motorway between Wellington and Kāpiti has been riddled with delays and was originally due to open in April 2020.

node.title: Long Covid patient describes lasting fatigue: 'My world has become very small'
node.description: Concern is mounting over the long-term effects of Covid-19 for more than 600,000 New Zealanders who have contracted the virus since the pandemic began. Audio

node.title: Here's where drivers are seeing the biggest breaks on gas prices
node.description: Drivers in Maryland and Georgia have seen almost immediate relief from tax holidays. But there could ultimately be a cost.

node.title: Foo Fighters cancel remaining shows after Taylor Hawkins' death
node.description: The band's tour​ included several destinations across the world.

node.title: John Travolta adopted puppy from Oscars' Betty White tribute
node.description: John Travolta and his son Ben adopted MacNCheese shortly after Jamie Lee Curtis brought the puppy on stage with her.

node.title: Hannah Gadsby on healing through comedy, new memoir
node.description: Hannah Gadsby's Netflix special "Nanette" won her an Emmy Award, a Peabody Award, and a book deal.

node.title: Blues hold off Moana Pasifika second half charge
node.description: The Blues have their fourth win of the Super Rugby Pacific season, but they've been made to work for it by Moana Pasifika.

node.title: Feds sue TurboTax maker, alleging it lies about "free" filing
node.description: Federal regulators allege the popular tax prep tool isn't really free, as software maker claims in its ads.

node.title: Search continues for tramper missing in Milford Sound
node.description: The search for a tramper reported overdue from Milford Sound shortly after midnight on Monday will continue today, with more teams being brought in to help.

node.title: Hilaria Baldwin, mother of 6, says she is expecting another child
node.description: She shared the news in an Instagram post​ Tuesday, calling it a "huge surprise."

node.title: Flamingo that escaped Kansas zoo in 2005 spotted in Texas
node.description: Wildlife officials were able to make out the bird's leg band on a video, which they posted on Facebook.
